definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]

sentences.english: They achieve a significantly higher power density than standard medium wave heaters.
sentences.chinese: 它们可实现比标准中波加热器更高的功率密度。

sentences.english: Tang Jiaxuan pointed out that relations between China and Bosnia-Herzegovina have been developing smoothly since the establishment of diplomatic relations.
sentences.chinese: 唐家璇指出，中波两国建交以来，双边关系发展平稳。

sentences.english: This paper introduces the distributed supervisory control system and its application in the medium wave station.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了分布式控制系统原理及其中波发射台的应用。

sentences.english: The feasibility of biconical MW antenna with self-supporting tower is discussed based on the structural analysis.
sentences.chinese: 从结构分析上探讨自立塔双锥形中波天线的可行性。

sentences.english: Real mid-wave infrared images are used to evaluate the performance of the proposed similarity measure.
sentences.chinese: 采用真实的中波红外图像验证了该相似性度量的性能。

sentences.english: The scanning testing system of IR micron-spot about MWIR and LWIR is described.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了中波和长波“红外小光点扫描测试系统”。

sentences.english: Can you get the station on FM as well as on medium wave?
sentences.chinese: 除中波外，你还可以收听调频台吗？

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Guo2 ji4 Guang3 bo1 Dian4 tai2
